concept.title: SDC Record Data Format
concept.shortdesc: SDC Record is a proprietary data format that the can use to read and write data. The also uses SDC Record to generate error records.

conbody.p: SDC Recordsdata formatData Collectordata formatUse the SDC Record data format to process data from another pipeline, or to generate data to be processed by another pipeline.

You can use the following origins to read SDC Record data:
Directory
Kafka Consumer

You can use the following destinations to write SDC Record data:
Hadoop FS
Kafka Producer
